publications.title: Enhancing LLM Routing and Agentic AI Framework for Data Science Pipelines
publications.abstract: This research presents an innovative approach to enhancing Large Language Model (LLM) routing mechanisms within agentic AI frameworks for data science pipelines. The study focuses on optimizing the decision-making processes of AI agents in automated machine learning workflows, particularly in the context of data preprocessing, feature selection, and model optimization.

publications.title: Optimizing Data Preprocessing: The Data Preprocessing Interface
publications.abstract: A comprehensive study on optimizing data preprocessing workflows through intelligent automation and user-friendly interfaces. The research addresses common challenges in data cleaning, transformation, and preparation for machine learning applications.

publications.title: Use of Brain Computer Interface in Modern AI Applications
publications.abstract: An exploration of Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) technologies and their integration with modern artificial intelligence systems. The study examines the potential applications and challenges in developing AI-powered BCI solutions.

conferences.title: ICMETET 2024 Conference
conferences.presentationTitle: Enhancing LLM Routing and Agentic AI Framework for Data Science Pipelines
conferences.conference: International Conference on Modern Engineering Technologies and Emerging Trends
conferences.abstract: Presented research findings on enhancing LLM routing mechanisms within agentic AI frameworks for data science pipelines at the International Conference on Modern Engineering Technologies and Emerging Trends.
